entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then a few showers beginning this evening and ending near midnight. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1 except low minus 3 inland. POP 40%
